# Text

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Text component provides a way to easily add text to interface with full support for type, size, weight, color and style.

## Usage

### Key example

```jsx live
<BrText color="Constructive-600">
  This text is formatted with the color token Constructive-600
</BrText>
```
